attributes.action: We need an immediate General Election.
attributes.additional_details: Just look at their record. Their real record, not the distorted lies they, and the MSM, dish out...
attributes.background: This government is incapable of carrying out the primary function of government; To look after the best interests of the people and the country. This government has repeatedly shown contempt for the people it is supposed to represent. This is truly a kakistocracy...
